title: Mitsubishi FG40K 7,600lb Propane Forklift
item_description:
Mitsubishi FG40K 7,600lb Propane Forklift

Note: Forklift has been reserved by Auctioneer and will be available for pickup by appointment only on Wednesday, November 27th, 2024 from 3:00 pm - 3:30 pm. This unit will be used during the removal period, therefore the hours below are an approximate guideline.
  • Manufacturer: Mitsubishi
  • Model: FG40K
  • Load Capacity: 7,600 Lbs
  • Fuel Type: Propane
  • Mast Type: Three Stage
  • Hour Meter Reads: 2,631
  • Serial Number: AF29C00034
  • Overall Width: 55”
  • Overall Length: 192”
  • Overall Height: 89”
  • Truck Weight: 13,585 Lbs
  • Tread Width: 8”
  • Tire Type: Solid Rubber
  • Number of Front Tires: 2
  • Front Tire Size: 8.25-15
  • Number of Rear Tires: 2
  • Rear Tire Size: 700-12
  • Maximum Lift Height: 187”
  • Fork Length: 72”
  • Engine: 4.5L Inline 6 - 96 H.P. (4NSXB04.546C)
  • Transmission: Automatic
  • Condition: Used
  • Starts: Yes
  • Features: Side Shift Tilt
